metas.description: All the betting and race news for the Pertemps Final Handicap Hurdle at the Cheltenham Festival, including all the odds for the race from the major online bookmakers.

page.content:
Cheltenham Festival Day 3 Races - Pertemps Final Handicap Hurdle Odds

The Pertemps Final Handicap Hurdle is one of the toughest races for punters to decide on, the stats tell us that only one favourite has won the race since the turn of the century, which means that punters will need to be shrewd if they are to find the winner. This is despite the fact that there are a number of qualifiers for punters to study, horses that perform well in the qualifiers automatically qualify for the Pertemps final so it can be followed through the season.

Latest Cheltenham Gold Cup 2015 Odds

Pertemps Final Odds - Click To Bet
